TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Taromak, title = Taromak, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taromak} }

S.FORM: = Taromak = Gaga mniq Taytung Peynansyang ka alang Taromak. 493 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 1,388 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 89% niqan 1,235 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 11% niqan 153 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Rukai74%, Paiwan4%, Amis3%, Bunun1%, Puyuma3%, ni rahuq na o3%.

= Taromak = Gaga mniq Taytong Peynansyang ka alang Taromak. 493 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 1,388 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 89% niqan 1,235 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 11% niqan 153 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Rokai74%, Paiwan4%, Amis3%, Bonon1%, Poyoma3%, ni rahoq na o3%.
